translations: v.打电报给……；用电报发送（电文）；（无意中）流露，泄露（意图）；（拳击中）准备出拳（让对手来得及反应）；违法投票（telegraph 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I think Yahoo is telegraphing the fact that they will be spending more in 2008 to try and regain their competitive position against Google.
sentences.translation: 我认为雅虎在表明一个事实，2008年，他们将在投入更多，与谷歌竞争，试图重新夺回他们的竞争地位。

sentences.sentence: The written notice is regarded as being successfully delivered after 30 days when it is sent to the known nearest place in the form of news publishing, mailing, telegraphing and special carrier.
sentences.translation: 书面通知以登报、邮寄、电报和专人递交至最近为人所知的地址后30天视为已送达。
